cu.explanation: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NGU to loopback '127.0.0.1' will make NG-U interface unreachable, causing UPF connection failure and data path disruption.

du.explanation: Setting remote_n_address to '10.0.0.1' (unreachable subnet) will cause F1 interface connection failure to CU and DU initialization rejection.
